message.original: うっ――！ マスター、どうか私にチャンスを――！
message.translation: Ugh! Master, please give me a chance!

message.original: おぉ！ お目にかかれて光栄です！ 覚者様！！
message.translation: Oh! I am honored to meet you, Arisen!

message.original: 覚者様！ どうか我がマスターに！ 私に活躍の機会を！
message.translation: Arisen! Please be my master! Give me an opportunity to flourish!

message.original: 忠誠の心なら、誰にも負けません！
message.translation: If the loyalty of the heart is tested, I will not lose to anyone!

message.original: 粉骨砕身！ いかなる困難にも、共に立ち向かう所存！
message.translation: Do your best! No matter what the difficulties, we'll face them together!

message.original: 準備万端、何でもやりますよ！
message.translation: Ready to go, I will do anything!

message.original: マスター！ さぁ！！ 何でもお言いつけください！
message.translation: Master! Come on!! Please say anything!

message.original: 冒険の際はぜひお伴を！ 作りたいものがあれば、何でもご要望を！
message.translation: Please come along when you are on an adventure! If there is something you want to make, request anything!

message.original: クラフト作業は順調です、マスター！ ご安心を！
message.translation: Crafting is going well, Master! Do not worry!

message.original: 気合い十分で作業にかかっています！
message.translation: It will take plenty of work and fighting spirit!

message.original: 心配は要りません、完了まで万事お任せを！
message.translation: Do not worry, leave it to me to complete it!

message.original: うおおお、マスター！ 救って頂き面目次第もありません！！
message.translation: Uoooh, Master! I have no idea how to save you!!

message.original: マスター！！ くううっ――！ 必ずやこのご恩に報います！
message.translation: Master!! Wow~! This kindness will surely be repaid!

message.original: 異界の狭間に、わざわざ私などのために――！ 我がマスターはなんと慈悲深い方だ――！ 一層励み、お守りしなければ――
message.translation: For the purpose we offer! Between different worlds! We must protect the Arisen at all costs!
